name: Ribbon
overview: Keisuke Murakawa is a teenager who used to have tender feelings towards his childhood friend Makoto Aizawa. However, they grew apart as each was busy with their own school life. Now, when both begin to attend the same high school, Keisuke is unsure whether she or any of the older attractive schoolmates is the love of his life. Ribbon is a visual novel. The game requires the player to choose between two or more possible responses or actions during almost every scene, often multiple times. Going to certain locations or making different choices will branch the story. It is necessary to complete the initial scenario without getting a bad ending in order to proceed to the next chapter. The game focuses on dating and each branch of the story is dedicated to a particular female character. The game contains scenes with explicit sexual content.
